name: Cyberpunk AD City
description:
• This game was made as part of a fiverr free lance contract. This game is for showcase work and not a commercial purpose. 
  • The game was made in Unity HDRP 2019.3.3 
  • The assets used in this game are: Kitbash Neon City and RCC car controller
  • Game drone controls: 'WSAD' for horizonal movements, 'IKJL' for vertical movements
